column1: prompts
Do not assign to radiologists for whom order_rvu + radiologist_current_rvu ≥ radiologist_rvu_threshold to facility group 17
Do not assign to radiologists for whom order_rvu + radiologist_current_rvu ≥ 0.9 × radiologist_rvu_threshold to facility group 17
Do not assign to radiologists for whom order_rvu + radiologist_credited_rvu ≥ radiologist_rvu_threshold to facility group 17
Avoid assigning orders to radiologists whose current capacity exceeds 80% of their threshold to facility group 17
Prefer assigning orders to radiologists whose current RVU is below 30% of their RVU threshold to facility group 17
Do not assign an order if the order RVU is greater than the radiologist's remaining RVU capacity to facility group 17
Do not assign new orders if credited RVU is within 5% of the daily limit to facility group 17
Do not assign orders to radiologists if their current capacity usage is greater than or equal to 75% of their total capacity limit to facility group 17
Do not assign orders to radiologists whose license has expired to facility group 17
Assign an order only if the radiologist's remaining capacity is greater than or equal to 3 times the order RVU to facility group 17
Prefer assigning Head CT studies to radiologists whose current RVU is less than 40% of the daily RVU limit to facility group 17

Prefer assigning orders to radiologists only if their remaining capacity is greater than or equal to 2 times the order RVU and their current capacity usage is less than 80% of their total capacity to facility group 17

Assign an order only if adding the order increases the radiologist’s RVU utilization by less than 10% of their total RVU capacity, and the post-assignment total RVU does not exceed the radiologist’s RVU threshold to facility group 17
Assign an order if it is an Outpatient MR study, the priority is Routine, and the radiologist’s current RVU is below 70% of the daily RVU limit to facility group 17
Prefer assigning orders to radiologists who have more than 40% of their total capacity unused and their current RVU utilization is below 60% of their allowed RVU limit to facility group 17

Do not assign an order if both the radiologist's current capacity usage is greater than or equal to 70% and the radiologist's current RVU is greater than or equal to 70% of the daily RVU limit to facility group 17

Assign CT orders only if the order modality is CT, the radiologist's current RVU is less than 50% of the daily RVU limit, and the radiologist's current capacity usage is less than 80% to facility group 17
Prefer assigning elderly patient (age > 60) cases to radiologists whose current RVU does not exceed 50% of their RVU threshold to facility group 17
Assign an order only if the radiologist's remaining capacity is greater than 3 times the order RVU and the radiologist's credited RVU is less than 90% of the daily RVU limit to facility group 17
Do not assign an order if the radiologist's credited RVU is greater than half of the radiologist's remaining capacity to facility group 17
Assign an order only if the radiologist's RVU after assignment is less than the daily RVU limit and the radiologist's current capacity usage is less than 80% to facility group 17
Assign an order to a radiologist if either the radiologist's current RVU is less than 40% of the daily RVU limit or the radiologist has more than 30% remaining capacity to facility group 17

Assign an order if the patient gender is female, the radiologist facility matches the order facility, and either the radiologist's current capacity usage is less than 60% or the radiologist's current RVU is less than 50% of the daily RVU limit to facility group 17

Assign female-patient orders only if the patient gender is female, the radiologist facility matches the order facility, and the sum of the radiologist's current capacity and current RVU is less than 90% of the radiologist's daily RVU limit to facility group 17
Assign an order if either the radiologist has more than 50% of their daily RVU limit remaining or the radiologist has more than 45% remaining capacity to facility group 17

Assign an order only if the radiologist's RVU after assignment is less than 80% of the daily RVU limit, the radiologist's capacity usage after assignment is less than 85%, and the radiologist's credited RVU is less than 90% of the daily RVU limit to facility group 17

Assign Routine MRI orders for patients older than 65 years only if the radiologist's current RVU is less than 50% of the daily RVU limit and the radiologist's remaining capacity is greater than the patient age divided by 100 multiplied by the daily RVU limit to facility group 17
Assign Routine CT or MRI orders for patients younger than 30 years or older than 65 years only if the radiologist's RVU after assignment is less than 70% of the daily RVU limit to facility group 17
